text:
Alfons Borrell i Palazón (3 June 1931 – 6 October 2020) was a Spanish abstract painter. He was born in Barcelona. His art was one of the first seen in the Barcelona Museum of Contemporary Art. In 1969 he joined the Grup Gallot "(Gallot Group)".
Borrell i Palazón died on 6 October 2020 in Sabadell at the age of 89.
